alert.note: Alert for Muscatine (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 16 at 9:28PM CDT until May 18 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Missouri...Illinois...Iowa... Mississippi River at Keithsburg, New Boston LD17, Muscatine, Ill. City LD16, Rock Island LD15, Camanche, Burlington, Gladstone LD18, and Dubuque. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Mississippi River at Ill. City LD16. * WHEN...Until Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, Water affects the park at Andalusia. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 PM CDT Tuesday the stage was 15.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early tomorrow afternoon and continue falling to 12.7 feet Tuesday evening. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. The next statement will be issued this early this morning.
